member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS
member.summary: Used with method .

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_NONE
member.summary: Do nothing.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_BROWSER_PERSIST_SETTINGS
member.summary: Use the browser stream for this item. (Same window position as IE browser windows.)

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_RENAME_FOLDER_OPTIONS_TOINTERNET
member.summary: Rename Folder Options to Internet Options in the Tools or View menu.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_BOTH_OPTIONS
member.summary: Keep both Folder Options and Internet Options in the Tools or View menu.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BIF_PREFER_INTERNET_SHORTCUT
member.summary: This namespace extension prefers a .url shortcut over a .lnk shortcut.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_BROWSE_NO_IN_NEW_PROCESS
member.summary: Do not use "Browse in New Process" by invoking a shortcut.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_ENABLE_HYPERLINK_TRACKING
member.summary: Track display name to determine when hyperlinks should be tagged as previously used.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_USE_IE_OFFLINE_SUPPORT
member.summary: Use Internet Explorer's offline support.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_SUBSTITUE_INTERNET_START_PAGE
member.summary: Use Start Page support for this namespace extension.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_USE_IE_LOGOBANDING
member.summary: Use the Brand block in the Toolbar.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_ADD_IE_TOCAPTIONBAR
member.summary: Append " - Internet Explorer" to display name in the caption bar.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_USE_DIALUP_REF
member.summary: Reference the DialUp reference count while the browser is navigated to this location. This will also enable the ICW and Software update.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_USE_IE_TOOLBAR
member.summary: Use the Internet Explorer toolbar.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_NO_PARENT_FOLDER_SUPPORT
member.summary: Disable navigation to parent folders. Used for the button that navigates to parent folder or the View.GoTo.ParentFolder feature.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_NO_REOPEN_NEXT_RESTART
member.summary: Browser windows are not reopened after a reboot of the system, regardless of whether they were open before the reboot. Use the same behavior for the namespace extension.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_GO_HOME_PAGE
member.summary: Add Home Page to menu (Go).

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_PREFER_IEPROCESS
member.summary: Prefer use of Iexplore.exe over Explorer.exe.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_SHOW_NAVIGATION_CANCELLED
member.summary: If navigation is terminated, show the Action Canceled HTML page.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_USE_IE_STATUSBAR
member.summary: Use the persisted Internet Explorer status bar settings.

member.name: BROWSERFRAMEOPTIONS.BFO_QUERY_ALL
member.summary: Return all values.
